name: postal_code
sql:
(ip) -> 
    toUInt64(multiIf(
        isIPv4String(ip), dictGetUInt32('maxmind_geoip_city_blocks_ipv4', 'postal_code', tuple(IPv4StringToNumOrDefault(toString(    assumeNotNull(ip))))),
        isIPv6String(ip), dictGetUInt32('maxmind_geoip_city_blocks_ipv6', 'postal_code', tuple(IPv6StringToNumOrDefault(toString(    assumeNotNull(ip))))),
        0
    ))
